"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53ed49e66368722780580000#post_53ed49e66368722780580000
Always find out someone's political and religious views before you date them.

I would never date a Christian, Jew, Muslim, a creationist or an anti-GMO/anti-vaccine activist.
